abstract: Ruby Cohn, theater scholar, dies at age 89.
snippet: Ms. Cohn, a theater scholar and drama professor, became the playwright Samuel Beckett’s friend as well as a leading authority on his work.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Cohn, a theater scholar and drama professor, became the playwright Samuel Beckett’s friend as well as a leading authority on his work.

headline.main: Ruby Cohn, Writer and Expert on Beckett, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Ruby Cohn, Writer and Expert on Beckett, Dies at 89
headline.seo: Ruby Cohn, Theater Scholar and Beckett Authority, Dies at 89
